content: skill level easy + level 3 wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 2 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm split ring stitch markers beret is worked in rounds turn at the beginning of each round ribbing is worked in row sew short ends of ribbing together to finish available in different versions 70779ad good catch beret 1 2008 *640-099 fisherman* 70780ad vineyards beret 2 2005 *640-143 claret* 80005ad textured beret 3 2008 *640-110 navy* similar-looking pattern l10607 galaxy hat 4 in wool-ease thick & quick is constructed from the bottom up *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * 1 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-good-catch-beret-1 2 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-vineyards-beret-1 3 https //www lionbrand com/products/crochet-pattern-textured-beret-1 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/galaxy-hat-2
